entities.name: carrows
entities.description: The Carrows are bound by a shimmering silver rope.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as turning to face Harry again.

entities.name: he-who-must-not-be-named
entities.description: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is mentioned as a name known by Voldemort.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry experiences physical pain and sees his scar on fire.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna's shoulder is being held by Harry to steady himself.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's orders are mentioned as the reason for Harry's actions.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as getting nearer and wanting to kill Harry.

entities.name: basin
entities.description: A basin whose potion has turned clear is mentioned.

relationships.description: Harry is holding Luna's shoulder to steady himself.
Harry is acting on Dumbledore's orders.
